title: Weird Al Tops Billboard Album Chart
teaser: It was an exciting week for comedian-singer "Weird Al" Yankovic, whose latest album "Mandatory Fun" debuted at number one.
contentencoded:
It was an exciting week for comedian-singer “Weird Al” Yankovic, whose latest album “Mandatory Fun” debuted at number one this week on the Billboard 200.

The album, which was released July 15, features parodies of popular pop songs including Lorde’s “Royals” and Robin Thicke’s “Blurred Lines.”
